item.title: 人工智能革命是手机购买者的事后思考
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将探讨在 ChatGPT 首次亮相多年后，人工智能仍未能引起智能手机买家的共鸣。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov looks at the failure of AI to resonate with smartphone buyers years after the seminal debut of ChatGPT.】

item.title: 杰斐逊称美联储接近中性时应缓慢行事
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）表示，鉴于利率已下调至更接近既不限制也不刺激经济的中性水平，美国央行应谨慎行事。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said the US central bank should move cautiously given that interest rates had been lowered closer to a neutral level that neither restricts nor stimulates the economy.】

item.title: 世界杯体育场建造商计划在摩洛哥首次公开募股，为大量订单提供资金
item.description: 为 2030 年国际足联世界杯建造世界上最大体育场之一的摩洛哥公司计划在卡萨布兰卡证券交易所上市并举债，以帮助其为创纪录水平的订单提供资金。【原文：The Moroccan firm building one of the world’s biggest stadiums for the 2030 FIFA World Cup plans to list its shares on the Casablanca stock exchange and raise debt to help it fund a record level of orders.】

item.title: 利润增长，KKR 信贷为四年来最佳筹资业绩提供动力
item.description: 受信贷产品创纪录需求的推动，KKR & Co.公布了四年多来筹资情况最好的一个季度，盈利超出华尔街预期。【原文：KKR & Co. reported its best fundraising quarter in more than four years, driven by record demand for its credit products, as earnings topped Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 小众芯片股成为欧洲下一个人工智能大热门
item.description: 追逐下一个人工智能赢家的欧洲股票投资者盯上了一个新目标。【原文：European stock investors chasing the next artificial-intelligence winner have latched on to a new target.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡预算以投资和改革为目标，保护国际货币基金组织的救助计划
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克（Anura Kumara Dissanayake）在提交 2026 年国家预算时承诺进行改革，以确保国际货币基金组织 30 亿美元的救助计划按计划进行，并宣布了吸引投资的措施，以维持经济从历史性违约中复苏。【原文：Sri Lanka President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, presenting the nation’s 2026 budget, pledged reforms to keep a $3 billion International Monetary Fund bailout on track and announced measures to attract investments for sustaining the economy’s recovery from a historic default.】

item.title: 智利年度通胀率意外降至 2021 年 4 月以来最低水平
item.description: 智利央行表示，在再次降息之前仍需收集更多数据，几天后公布的报告显示，智利的年度通胀率意外放缓至 2021 年 4 月以来的最低水平。【原文：Chile’s annual inflation unexpectedly slowed to the lowest level since April 2021 in a report published days after the central bank said it still needs to gather more data before delivering another interest rate cut.】

item.title: 即使关门很快结束，美联储 12 月利率决定也不会轻易作出
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，美联储官员不得不在没有关键经济统计数据的情况下做出最新的利率决定。政府重新开放后，他们将收到的数据可能不会让下一次决定变得更容易。【原文：Federal Reserve officials had to make their latest interest-rate decision without key economic statistics thanks to the US government shutdown. The data they will receive when the government reopens probably won’t make the next decision any easier.】

item.title: 股票和信贷投资者对人工智能的疑虑日渐加深
item.description:
围绕人工智能的乐观情绪提振了科技股。但是，由于公司正在利用信贷市场借贷现金，投资者变得越来越谨慎。【原文：

Optimism around AI has boosted tech stocks. But investors are growing cautious now that companies are tapping credit markets to borrow cash. 

】

item.title: 人工智能对决：美国和中国的差距
item.description: 美国掀起人工智能热潮已有近三年时间，而世界上大多数国家仍在努力追赶。只有一个国家在人工智能发展方面接近美国：中国。【原文：It’s been almost three years since the US kicked off the artificial intelligence boom, and most of the world is still trying to catch up. Only one country is close to matching the US in AI development: China.】

item.title: 芯片流动为荷兰逆转敞开大门，Nexperia 争端缓和
item.description: 中国允许荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 再次出口，为荷兰暂停对这家中资企业的权力创造了条件。【原文：China is allowing Dutch chipmaker Nexperia to export again, setting the stage for the Netherlands to suspend its powers over the Chinese-owned company.】

item.title: 中国解除对巴西家禽的禁令，结束长达五个月的停滞期
item.description: 中国已经取消了长达数月的从巴西进口家禽的禁令，此举有望重振中国从世界第一大肉类运输国的采购。【原文：China has lifted a months-long ban on poultry imports from Brazil, a move that’s poised to revive purchases from the world’s top shipper of the meat.】

item.title: 迪拜烟壶制造商 AIR 将与 Cantor SPAC 合并上市

item.title: 中国市场无视全球避险情绪，彰显信心
item.description: 本周，中国资产表现出令人印象深刻的韧性，无视全球风险偏好的回落，表明投资者对世界第二大经济体的信心不断增强。【原文：Chinese assets showed impressive resilience this week, defying a global pullback in risk appetite and signaling growing investor confidence in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 在欧尔班与特朗普会晤之前，莫尔将工作重心从俄罗斯石油转移到其他国家
item.description: 匈牙利唯一的炼油厂表示，它可以从非俄罗斯来源采购大部分原油，这标志着在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和总理维克托-欧尔班就俄罗斯石油制裁问题举行高风险会晤之前，匈牙利的基调发生了转变。【原文：Hungary’s sole refiner said it can procure most of its crude from non-Russian sources, marking a shift in tone ahead of a high-stakes meeting between US President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Viktor Orban on Russian oil sanctions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）会谈暂停且未达成新协议后，塞内加尔欧洲债券暴跌
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对塞内加尔为期两周的工作人员访问结束后，塞内加尔的美元债券创下了七个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds slumped the most in seven months after the International Monetary Fund’s two-week staff mission to the country ended without an agreement on a new program.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片热潮推动台湾实现 15 年来最快出口增长
item.description: 台湾的出口以 2010 年以来最快的速度激增，因为台湾经济抓住了全球对为人工智能提供动力的半导体的无底需求。【原文：Taiwan’s exports surged at the fastest pace since 2010 as the economy cashes in on bottomless global demand for semiconductors powering artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 贸易受阻，载有俄罗斯石油的船只罕见地驶离印度海域
item.description: 在特朗普政府加紧审查印度与俄罗斯的石油贸易之际，一艘载有来自最近受到制裁的俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）原油的油轮在孟买附近海域进行了一次罕见的货物转运。【原文：A tanker carrying crude from recently-sanctioned Rosneft PJSC has made a rare cargo transfer off Mumbai, as the Trump administration ramps up its scrutiny of India’s oil trade with Russia.】

item.title: 关于美国劳动力市场恶化状况的更多信息
item.description:
没有就业报告的就业插曲。【原文：

A jobs episode in absence of a jobs report.

】

item.title: 关于劳动力市场恶化状况的更多信息（播客）
item.description: 如果政府开放，我们今天就会收到一份就业报告。但现在，我们正处于官方经济数据封锁的状态。这是不幸的，因为经济已经处于一个非常混乱的境地，所以现在任何额外的数据都将非常有助于弄清事情的走向。在非农数据缺席的情况下，我们与彭博社观点专栏作家康纳-森（Conor Sen）就劳动力市场日益恶化的状况进行了讨论，以及他为什么认为美联储需要介入的原因【原文：If the government were open, we’d be getting a jobs report today. But as it is, we’re in this blackout of official economic data. That’s unfortunate, because the economy is already in a very confusing spot, and so any additional data right now would be very helpful in figuring out where things are heading. In the absence of Non-Farm Payrolls, we talked with Bloomberg Opinion columnist Conor Sen about the worsening state of the labor market, and why he thinks the Federal Reserve needs to step in】

item.title: Rightmove 股价因指导意见和人工智能支出创历史最大跌幅

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长大幅放缓，股市跌至三年低点
item.description: 菲律宾经济增长急剧放缓，加深了人们对今年表现最差的市场之一的悲观情绪，菲律宾股市跌至多年低点。【原文：Philippine stocks fell to multi-year lows after a sharp slowdown in economic growth deepened pessimism toward one of this year’s worst-performing markets.】
